content: you are using magic loop you should maintain the instep sts on one needle and the sole sts on the other needle additionally you will only 3 @twinsetandpurl ©rachel fletcher 2023 #kinggeorgesocks written instructions - king round 7 k3 1/1 lc k2 1/1 rc p1 × 3 k1 george pattern round 8 k8 p2 × 3 k1 the lace pattern is worked on the front and round 9 k4 1/1 lc 1/1 rc p2 × 3 k1 back of the leg and continued on the instep round 10 k7 p3 × 3 k1 sts of the foot round 11 k5 1/1 rc p2 1/1 rc k4 × 2 needle 1 k0 2 work written instructions 1/1 rc p2 1/1 rc k0 2 31 35 sts round 12 k6 p3 k7 × 2 p3 k2 needle 2 k1 3 work written instructions k1 3 33 37 sts round 13 1/1 lc k4 p2 1/1 rc × 3 k1 written instructions round 14 k6 p2 k8 × 2 p2 k3 round 1 1/1 lc p2 1/1 lc k4 × 2 1/1 lc round 15 k1 1/1 lc k3 p1 1/1 rc k2 × 3 p2 1/1 lc k5 31 sts round 16 k1 p1 k4 × 6 round 2 k2 p3 k7 × 2 p3 k6 round 17 k1 p1 1/1 lc k2 1/1 rc k3 × 3 round 3 k1 1/1 lc p2 k4 1/1 rc × 3 round 4 k3 p2 k8 × 2 p2 k6 round 18 k1 p2 k8 × 3 round 5 k2 1/1 lc p1 k3 1/1 rc × 3 k1 round 19 k1 p2 1/1 lc 1/1 rc k4 × 3 round 6 k4 p1 × 6 k1 round 20 k1 p3 k7 × 3 chart instructions - king george pattern the lace pattern is worked on the front and back of the leg and continued on the instep sts of the foot needle 1 k0 2 work chart k0 2 31 35 sts needle 2 k1 3 work chart k1 3 33 37 sts special stitches 1/1lc slip 1 st knitwise slip 1 st knitwise as if to ssk slip both sts back onto lh needle in their new orientation knit into the back of the 2nd st approaching from the back then knit into the back of both sts together and slip both sts from the needle 1/1rc k2tog leaving the original sts on the lh needle then knit the 1st st only and slip both sts from the needle 4 @twinsetandpurl ©rachel fletcher 2023 #kinggeorgesocks
